name: Bardysh: Kromeford no Juunin
overview: Bardysh is a roguelike RPG released by Imadio. Adventurers seeking a thrill came to Igis Island in search for the world's oldest heritage, a crystal that is said to make all wishes come true. Everybody is anxious to explore the labyrinth which nobody had reached the end of and the game offers 5 dungeons for the player to explore. Apart from exploring the dungeons, the island offers an arena to test one's strength. The main character can be chosen from 3 different types of species with male and female options. Each species can use different kinds of weapons.
